ModMetaData.name: Music Blocker (屏蔽音乐)
ModMetaData.author: trigger
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Music Blocker - Music Manager Extension[/h1]
This is a specialized extension for [b]Music Manager (Continued)[/b]. It fills the gap by allowing you to disable specific tracks, giving you full control over your colony's playlist.
[h2]Features[/h2] [list] [*] [b]Integrated Block Toggles[/b]: Adds a checkbox column directly to the Music Manager's song list. Check to play, uncheck to block. [*] [b]Drag-Select Support[/b]: Quickly toggle multiple songs by clicking and dragging your mouse, just like in a spreadsheet. [*] [b]Persistent Settings[/b]: Your blocking preferences are saved permanently and will persist even after restarting the game. [*] [b]Seamless Integration[/b]: Blends perfectly into the original UI without adding cluttered setting menus. [/list]
[h2]Installation[/h2] This mod requires [b]Music Manager (Continued)[/b]. Make sure to load this mod [b]AFTER[/b] the original mod.
[hr]
[h1]P-music 屏蔽音乐扩展[/h1]
这是一个为 [b]Music Manager (Continued)[/b] 模组量身定制的扩展补丁。它填补了原模组无法禁用特定音乐的遗憾，让你可以完全掌控自己的播放列表。
[h2]核心功能[/h2] [list] [*] [b]直观的屏蔽开关[/b]：在 Music Manager 的播放列表右侧直接添加了一列复选框，勾选即播放，取消即屏蔽。 [*] [b]支持拖拽选择[/b]：你可以像在 Excel 中一样，点击并拖拽鼠标快速勾选或取消多首歌曲，整理超长列表不再痛苦。 [*] [b]持久化保存[/b]：你的屏蔽设置会自动保存，即使重启游戏也会依然生效。 [*] [b]无缝集成[/b]：完美融入原模组 UI，不产生额外的设置菜单，保持界面整洁。 [/list]
[h2]安装说明[/h2] 本模组依赖于 [b]Music Manager (Continued)[/b]，请确保已安装并将其加载在原模组之后。
